title: Media Library
no_media_found: No media items found. Start by uploading a new file.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try refreshing the page.

upload_dialog.title: Upload New Media
upload_dialog.description: Select a file from your device to upload. It will be processed and saved to the library.
upload_dialog.items_selected: {count, plural, =1 {# item selected} other {# items selected}}

error.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while uploading "{filename}".

upload_dialog.upload_failed: The following files could not be uploaded:
upload_dialog.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

edit_dialog.title: Edit Media Details
edit_dialog.description: Update the details for this media item.

delete_dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the file "{filename}" from the storage and the database.

action_bar.items_selected: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} selected

delete_dialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
delete_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the {count, plural, one {1 file} other {# files}}.

success_messages.delete_many_success: The selected items have been successfully deleted.
success_messages.delete_one_success: The media item has been successfully deleted.
